title: Senior UX / UI
descriptions: Lead key initiatives for an MVP for a startup competing in the online ticketing market.

title: Product Owner - UX / UI Lead
descriptions: Leveraged analytics tools such as Clarity, Google Analytics, and Power BI to identify pain points and prioritize development efforts.
Increased conversion rate from 7% to 14.2% through platform enhancements.
Integrated WhatsApp APIs to streamline registration, boosting sign-ups by 500 new users per month.

title: UX UI Lead
descriptions: Conducted in-depth research, design, and prototype testing, leveraging iterative prototyping methods to refine designs based on user feedback and industry insights.
Developed an MVP for a heavy cargo transportation service, which includes a landing page, a driver app, a client app for companies requesting transport, and an administrative module.

title: UX / UI Designer
descriptions: Designed and prototyped a user-friendly webpage tailored for students with no prior job experience, helping them transition into the workforce.
Key tasks included benchmarking, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing with Maze.
The final design was successfully deployed to production, receiving positive feedback and strong reviews.
